name: Train Runner VR
description: Train Runner VR is an experience that immediately catapults you into the action as you are hurtled over a mountain pass only to gently land on railroad tracks that span a jaw-dropping five-hundred-foot gorge. A distressed puppy at the center of a trestle bridge can only be saved by overcoming a series of harrowing challenges and obstacles. Train Runner VR tests your nerve to see if you have what it takes to save Panda before being trampled by a rampaging locomotive.
